document.heading: Board of Education Capital Construction Contracting Authority Temporary Act of 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-131, the “Board of Education Capital Construction Contracting Authority Temporary Act of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-529. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 27, 1990, and March 13, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 27, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-183 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
